sections.name: IxamÃ¨
sections.text: This creature did not include a description.

traits.name: Unique
traits.text: A rules element with this trait is one-of-a-kind. The DC of Recall Knowledge checks related to creatures with this trait is increased by 10.

traits.name: Air
traits.text: Effects with the air trait either manipulate or conjure air. Those that manipulate air have no effect in a vacuum or an area without air. Creatures with this trait consist primarily of air or have a magical connection to that element. Planes with this trait consist mostly of open spaces and air with various degrees of turbulence, though they also contain rare islands of floating stone and other elements and energies.

traits.name: Dragon
traits.text: Dragons are reptilian creatures, often winged or with the power of flight. Most are able to use a breath weapon and are immune to sleep and paralysis.

traits.name: Elemental
traits.text: Elementals are creatures directly tied to an element and native to the Elemental Planes. Elementals don’t need to breathe.

traits.name: Undead
traits.text: Once living, these creatures were infused after death with negative energy and soul-corrupting evil magic. When reduced to 0 Hit Points, an undead creature is destroyed. Undead creatures are damaged by positive energy, are healed by negative energy, and don't benefit from healing effects.

interaction_abilities.name: Mist Vision
interaction_abilities.text: Fog and mist don't impair a cloud dragon's vision; IxamÃ¨ ignores the concealed condition from fog and mist.

traits.name: Aura
traits.text: An aura is an emanation that continually ebbs out from you, affecting creatures within a certain radius. Aura can also refer to the magical signature of an item or a creature with a strong alignment.

traits.name: Emotion
traits.text: This effect alters a creature's emotions. Effects with this trait always have the mental trait as well. Creatures with special training or that have mechanical or artificial intelligence are immune to emotion effects.

traits.name: Fear
traits.text: Fear effects evoke the emotion of fear. Effects with this trait always have the mental and emotion traits as well.

traits.name: Mental
traits.text: A mental effect can alter the target's mind. It has no effect on an object or a mindless creature.

automatic_abilities.name: Deflecting Cloud
automatic_abilities.trigger: IxamÃ¨ is the target of a ranged attack

automatic_abilities.name: Requirements
automatic_abilities.effect: IxamÃ¨ rapidly flexes one of her wings and creates a billowing cloud of mist. She is treated as if she were hidden for the purposes of resolving the triggering attack, so normally the attacker must succeed at a DC 11 flat check to target her. IxamÃ¨ also gains a +4 circumstance bonus to AC against the triggering attack.
automatic_abilities.text: IxamÃ¨ is aware of the attack and has a free wing;

traits.name: Poison
traits.text: An effect with this trait delivers a poison or deals poison damage. An item with this trait is poisonous and might cause an affliction.

traits.name: Reach
traits.text: Natural attacks with this trait can be used to attack creatures up to the listed distance away instead of only adjacent creatures. Weapons with this trait are long and can be used to attack creatures up to 10 feet away instead of only adjacent creatures. For creatures that already have reach with the limb or limbs that wield the weapon, the weapon increases their reach by 5 feet.

traits.name: Agile
traits.text: The multiple attack penalty you take with this weapon on the second attack on your turn is –4 instead of –5, and –8 instead of –10 on the third and subsequent attacks in the turn.

traits.name: Reach
traits.text: Natural attacks with this trait can be used to attack creatures up to the listed distance away instead of only adjacent creatures. Weapons with this trait are long and can be used to attack creatures up to 10 feet away instead of only adjacent creatures. For creatures that already have reach with the limb or limbs that wield the weapon, the weapon increases their reach by 5 feet.

traits.name: Deadly
traits.text: On a critical hit, the weapon adds a weapon damage die of the listed size. Roll this after doubling the weapon's damage. This increases to two dice if the weapon has a _greater striking rune_ and three dice if the weapon has a _major striking rune_. For instance, a rapier with a _greater striking rune_ deals 2d8 extra piercing damage on a critical hit. An ability that changes the size of the weapon's normal damage dice doesn't change the size of its deadly die.

traits.name: Reach
traits.text: Natural attacks with this trait can be used to attack creatures up to the listed distance away instead of only adjacent creatures. Weapons with this trait are long and can be used to attack creatures up to 10 feet away instead of only adjacent creatures. For creatures that already have reach with the limb or limbs that wield the weapon, the weapon increases their reach by 5 feet.

ability.name: Breath Weapon

traits.name: Evocation
traits.text: Effects and magic items with this trait are associated with the evocation school of magic, typically involving energy and elemental forces.

traits.name: Poison
traits.text: An effect with this trait delivers a poison or deals poison damage. An item with this trait is poisonous and might cause an affliction.

traits.name: Primal
traits.text: This magic comes from the primal tradition, connecting to the natural world and instinct. Anything with this trait is magical.

ability.text: IxamÃ¨ breathes a cloud of poison like that emitted from Terwa Lake that deals 11d6 poison damage in a 40- foot cone (DC 29 basic Reflex save). She can't use Breath Weapon again for 1d4 rounds.

ability.name: Cloud Walk
ability.text: IxamÃ¨ can tread on clouds or fog as though on solid ground.

ability.name: Draconic Frenzy
ability.text: IxamÃ¨ makes two claw Strikes and one horn Strike in any order.

ability.name: Draconic Momentum
ability.text: IxamÃ¨ recharges her Breath Weapon whenever she scores a critical hit when making a Strike.
